alert.note: Alert for Arkansas; Cleveland; Desha; Drew; Jefferson; Lincoln (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 15 at 5:39PM CDT until May 15 at 6:45PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Cleveland County in southeastern Arkansas... Desha County in southeastern Arkansas... Northern Drew County in southeastern Arkansas... Southeastern Jefferson County in southeastern Arkansas... Lincoln County in southeastern Arkansas... Southeastern Arkansas County in southeastern Arkansas... * Until 645 PM CDT. * At 538 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near St. Charles to Grady to Rison, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Dumas... Star City... Rison... Rohwer... Gould... Gillett... Grady... Mitchellville... Tillar... Watson... Winchester... Whitefield... Plantersville... Little Bayou Meto Park... Douglas... Trusten Holder WMA... Herbine... Nebo... Feenyville... Yancopin... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Arkansas; Cleveland; Desha; Drew; Jefferson; Lincoln
